user_reviews.summary: Amazon Lex has an average rating of 4.2 out of 5 stars on G2 (based on 37 reviews), 4.0 out of 5 stars on Capterra (based on 2 reviews), and 4.4 out of 5 stars on Gartner (based on 45 reviews).

description: Amazon Lex is a service for building conversational interfaces into applications using voice and text. It provides advanced deep learning functionalities of automatic speech recognition (ASR) and natural language understanding (NLU) to recognize user intent. Lex powers Amazon Alexa and allows developers to build sophisticated, natural language chatbots with lifelike conversational interactions. The service includes an automated chatbot designer that accelerates development by analyzing conversation transcripts and suggesting bot designs.
